d.name: Etre
d.phase: Greetings, traveller. What can I do for you?
You head off, disappointed. This language is impossible to understand...

[I am in the service of our masters. In the spirit of self-indulgence, they turned me into a gladiator. I entertain them by fighting my fellow man.] [I had to retire a short time ago because of my injuries, I've no longer got what it takes... I'd like to be useful again, but nobody wants me...]
He understood what you said, but he doesn't know what to say... Clearly this word hasn't had any real effect on him.

d.name: Etre
d.phase: Greetings, traveller. What can I do for you?

[Well yes, beforehand my role was to entertain by fighting, but now I'm in charge of educating young Dorogons and Arborians. I teach them the Art of War and poetry.] [It's turned me into something of a celebrity in my town, I'm ever so grateful to the new ArchDorogon for giving me this opportunity.]
